siteDescription: Your premier destination for outdoor adventures and nature accommodations
homeHeroDescription: Discover peaceful retreats and thrilling adventures in the heart of nature.
homeHeroIntroText: Welcome to Great Outdoors, where adventure meets comfort in the heart of nature. We connect people with unforgettable outdoor experiences, from cozy cabin retreats to exciting wilderness adventures.
homeActivitiesSectionDescription: Experience the thrill of outdoor adventures with our carefully curated selection of activities. From heart-pumping adventures to peaceful nature experiences, there's something for everyone.
homeAccommodationsSectionDescription: Explore our range of comfortable and scenic accommodations, perfect for your next getaway.
homeCallToActionSectionDescription: Book your stay now and experience the beauty of nature with comfortable accommodations.
footerText: Â© 2025 Great Outdoors. All rights reserved. | Connecting people with nature for generations.
